htmlContent:
Decrement DEFCON.

When USA next plays a card in an action round, unless that card is 032-E UN Intervention and USA chooses to resolve it, award USSR 3 VP.
name: We Will Bury You*
plainContent:
Decrement DEFCON.
When USA next plays a card in an action round, unless that card is 032-E UN Intervention and USA chooses to resolve it, award USSR 3 VP.
